pages.text: $(li)Who said that the $(l:patchouli:armors/end_crystal)End Crystal Armor$(/l) is the best armor that you can make?$(br)$(li)The Ignitium Armor will never take damage and such as the $(l:patchouli:armors/netherite_armor)Netherite Armor$(/l) cannot be destroyed by fire or lava.$(br)$(li)Every part of this armor gives you a different effect.

pages.name: Ignitium Armor
pages.text: It can be crafted placing an $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/ignitium_ingot)Ignitium Ingot$(/l) with the specific piece of $(l:patchouli:armors/netherite_armor)Netherite Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l).

$(li)The $(l)Ignitium Helmet$() allows you to see clearly under the lava.$(br)$(li)The $(l)Ignitium ChestPlate$() can be combined with an $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytra$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smithing_table)Smithing Table$(/l) to create an $(l:patchouli:armors/ignitium_elytra_chestplate)Ignitium Elytra ChestPlate$(/l).$(br)$(li)The $(l)The Ignitium Leggins$() remove the burn effect on you very quickly.$(br)$(li)The $(l)Ignitium Boots$() transform every lava block in $(l)Melting Netherrack$().
